scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:ledgerd" "npm run dev:mintd" "npm run dev:ai-marketplaced" "npm run dev:ai-trainingd" "npm run dev:ai-inferenced" "npm run dev:ai-datad" "npm run dev:ai-agentsd" "npm run dev:ai-contentd" "npm run dev:ai-validationd" "npm run dev:ai-deploymentd"
scripts.build: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:ledgerd && npm run build:mintd && npm run build:treasury && npm run build:ai-marketplaced && npm run build:ai-trainingd && npm run build:ai-inferenced && npm run build:ai-datad && npm run build:ai-agentsd && npm run build:ai-contentd && npm run build:ai-validationd && npm run build:ai-deploymentd
scripts.install:services: cd gateway && npm install && cd ../ledgerd && npm install && cd ../mintd && npm install && cd ../treasury && npm install && cd ../ai-marketplaced && npm install && cd ../ai-trainingd && npm install && cd ../ai-inferenced && npm install && cd ../ai-datad && npm install && cd ../ai-agentsd && npm install && cd ../ai-contentd && npm install && cd ../ai-validationd && npm install && cd ../ai-deploymentd && npm install
